cast.name: Mark Ross Edrys Mark Ross Edrys
Jason Todd Edrys Jason Todd Edrys

introduction: Misty (Kaylani Lei) is a call girl working at a cathouse run by Tamiko (Mika Tan). Tamiko runs her house like a mini-dictatorship, making all the girls follow a strict set of rules: No boyfriends, no taking tips, etc. Misty is the top girl in the house and would like to have her own house. After she finds out that the membership is $100,000 per year, Misty quits and joins Derek (Marcus Leland, aka Matt Dalpiaz) in opening The Red Geisha, a new house. The Red Geisha is the opposite of Tamiko's house: the girls have the freedom to do what they want. This entices two more of Tamiko's girls, Flower (Jasmine Byrne) and Ginger (Gianna Lynn) to join up. Tamiko vows to fight back with her hired police contact, Norton. She asks him to send a little message to Misty, which results in the death of Ginger. The wild card in the fight is Willa, played by Nina Mercedez. She's an independent escort, and is the new girl in town.
